item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Show HN: Put this touch sensor on a robot and learn super precise tasks (240 points | 45 comments)

13. Show HN: Inngest 1.0 – Open-source durable workflows on every platform (130 points | 35 comments)
